name: Piece Combat
description:
Defend against waves of aggressive shapes by placing units that are chosen by a roll of the dice!

This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam with the theme of "Roll the Dice" by three game dev YouTubers: n8dev, AIA, and Icoso. Because we are creative geniuses, we incorporated the theme with a rolling die.

To play, roll the die by clicking on it, and place units to defend your crystal from the enemy shapes.

Any ratings, bugs, and feedback are greatly appreciated! Subscribe to our channels so you don't miss our videos on the rollercoaster of a game jam we had :)

All assets were made during the jam, by us. Source code: https://github.com/natecurtiss/gmtk-2022
